website_summaries.verdict: While their sizing tends to run large, these are comfortable yet attractive pumps.
pros: Sturdy but stylish Mary Janes, with a 2.5-inch heel
cons: Like most Clarks, tend to run a little large
Patent leather trim may scratch easily

customer_reviews.title: like ths style and the color, but too large for me
customer_reviews.text: I have many Clark shoes, sandals, and boots. Normally size 6 is perfect for me. Yet these shoes are too large. There is a gap behind my heels in the shoes. I was going to exchange, but I decided to avoid troubles of paying extra and return. I have pads inside and keep the straps tight so that my heels do not come off of the shoes. Because of the wrong size, they are not super comfortable for me. I like the purple color and the style, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shoe purchases I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best shoe purchases I have ever made! Fit perfectly & true to size and oh so comfortable. The color was perfect and I got them at an unusually low price.....especially for Clarks. I mostly wear Clarks and because of a foot injury, it has been very difficult for me to wear any kind of cure dress shoe for years. Now that things are slowing getting better, I can usually wear Clarks without pain or fear causing inflammation. If you ever need a pair of Mary Janes, buy these! The only thing that keeps me from buy many more pairs is the limited color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: these look nice, but run small, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really surprised by the reviews that say these run large. I'm between a 7.5 and an 8 and I initially ordered a 7.5 based on the reviews. it was way too small and I exchanged for an 8. the size 8 pair also feels rather tight and I'm considering exchanging for an 8.5. I will update my review when i make up my mind. update: I returned the size 8 pair and was unable to exchange for 8.5. I'm not convinced the 8.5 would have been comfortable either. These are pretty, I'm sorry they didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: sarah c.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something that was comfortable and that I could wear all day if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Mary Jane style pump to wear with slacks. I wanted something that was comfortable and that I could wear all day if I needed to. There is nothing more aggravating to me than having to wear an uncomfortable shoe. I had some pumps like this some time ago by another company and they were so comfortable. I got hooked on Clarks shoes a few years ago so I wanted to give these a try. Just as I expected, the shoes felt so good to my feet. I am very pleased with everything about this shoe. If I had to by another pair I definitely would. I give these shoes a 5+ star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Sizing has changed
customer_reviews.text: Seems like Clarks have changed their sizing. They used to run large and wide. My true size is 10.5W but in Clarks the 10M would always fit. The last few pairs I tried in this size were too small and do not come in 10.5 (like most brands do not) Otherwise, they seemed like they would be really comfy. The search continues
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I love this shoes, very comfortable on my feet. I stand and walk all day long at work and my feet appreciate these shoes. I've always love Clarks as they are great quality and excellent for the price
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for a Cocktail Waitress
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1/2 size larger than what I usually wear and they were too big. I suggest buying your actual size. They also have an option for those with wide feet! The shoes are overall super comfortable. I have to stand 8 hours a day as a cocktail waitress in three and they do the job for comfort!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: CUTE and COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Clarks are amazingly comfortable.I have problems with my feet and, until Clarks, have not been able to wear dress shoes comfortably. I don't know how they do it but I actually like wearing these shoes.. I can easily wear these all day and my wide feet aren't pinched or painful and my arches don't feel stretched or sore. Not only are these shoes comfortable but their cute too. I bought them in red and black because they are so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ljalvz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for the perfect dress shoes for a while. Something that won’t kill my feet after 9 hours. These are great shoes, but they do leave slight red marks at the sides of my feet but that’s probably due to my small bunions. Overall, I can wear these longer than my other dress shoes and they’re very solid footwear. I wish the strap was closer to my toes and further from my ankle just because of how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable shoe, the heel is the perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Clarks Women's Garnit Tianna Dress Pump: This is a very comfortable shoe, the heel is the perfect height, not too high and the toe area is comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, cushy foot bed
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on stage for several hours. Very comfortable, cushy foot bed, nice toe space. My feet always kill me after singing for hours, especially with heels, but these were GREAT. I LOVE Clarks shoes all around.
customer_reviews.author: SingingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great option for walking and standing.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable with good support and cushion. The heel height is good for all day wear and walking and the rubber sole helps with comfort and traction. The first week I bought these I wore them to work every day and to a conference standing and walking a lot and did not have discomfort or blisters which is shocking for my feet. I wear a size 7 with wide toes and narrow heel so pumps are very difficult to find. I have 3 pairs of clarks that have been great for long days of standing and walking. Great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heel gives out.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes for work and work only. I have had them for 7 months now and the heel is already giving out, see picture. I am walking through the airport and airplane so no rough ground. Pretty disappointed as they are more expensive and my cheaper Payless shoes don’t give out as fast. Other than that the shoes are pretty comfy and I can wear them on long days without a sore foot at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes! They are worth every penny...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love these shoes. Very nice, soft leather. Burgundy color is gorgeous! SUPER COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit more snugly than I thougt they would but a pretty shoe, although I'm not wild about the round toe. They looked a bit more pointed in the pic when I bought them. I wear a size 5 which NO store carries so am reduced to the crapshoot that is purchasing shoes online. However, even being snug (barefoot) they are still pretty dang comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ImpatientT

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these shoes. I'm a flight attendant and some of my fellow flight attendants have these and love them. But these were far too narrow for my feet. I normally don't have this problem so I would say they run narrow? So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Heard these were the most comfortable shoe ever from a friend
customer_reviews.text: Heard these were the most comfortable shoe ever from a friend. Not for me. They are a little tight around the top of my feet which made them ache. Maybe they will stretch out. If so then they will be great. Worn them the entire day from 7 am to 9pm and the top is the only thing that was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Real leather but tight for me.
customer_reviews.text: Clark shoes are usually true to size. I wanted 11W in the absence of which i went for 12M and ofcourse they were tight in the front and too long for my feet. Couldn't return them unfortunately as I'm out of town. However, they're made of real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Es

customer_reviews.title: Clark’s quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 6.5 W in the black and burgundy. Unfortunately both pair were return products and had been worn. Also, there is no cushion insole in the shoes. I am thinking about returning both pair of shoes. I will have to purchase comfortable insoles. The tor box is skimpy and crushed my little toes. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Powerlifter

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely happy!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous pair of shoes! Awesome, comfortable fit as usual for Clarks. I trust this brand and even the heel doesn't throw me off as heels often do. Big hit and look beautiful and feminine. Would love another pair other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Gizzy

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable and love the color
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable and love the color! I have not put them to the test just yet, only walking around the house. Bought a 9 and 9.5. 9.5 was a lot more comfortable. The 9 pinched my toes. I am wearing them on a flight soon so I hope to update post. FYI I am 5'5" 169 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Clarks in this style and model
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks in this style and model. The heel is perfect, very comfortable. I have a similar pair that they no longer produce...this is just as good and very flattering as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina'sGlobalPlace

customer_reviews.title: Want an excuse to order more colors.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great looking, stable to walk in and surprisingly comfortable. Ordered my usual 8.5W and they fit perfectly. These are some of the most wearable dress shoes I have had in years!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable so far
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable so far. Maybe just slightly large but with the strap I dont think it will be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: SHH

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not Frumpy
customer_reviews.text: The size seems a little big but with thick socks is fine. My last pair of Clarks of a similar style lasted 10 years and were some comfortable I could run in them if need be. They seem to be the perfect combination of comfortable without being frumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ferris

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES! As a Flight Attendant, these heels fit the bill for our uniform compliance! I was hesitant about Clark’s, but these are the best shoes! They’re so sturdy and comfortable, I can work 12 hour days and my feet are fine. Definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jones

customer_reviews.title: No padding. Pain after standing 30 minuets
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. They feel the same as $20 Payless shoes. I gave it 3 stars because the leather and construction of the shoe is nice and will likely far outlast cheaper shoes; however, the “padded sole” feels like cardboard. I will only keep these shoes if I can find inserts that will actually cushion my feet.
customer_reviews.author: CAB386

customer_reviews.title: ... a nurse I appreciate this as a stylish and comfortable shoe for work
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse I appreciate this as a stylish and comfortable shoe for work. Fit as expected, leather, and cute! I've received so many compliments and comments-people are surprised to learn they're Clarks! The color is a nice change up and goes well with much of my wardrobe
customer_reviews.author: jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Stylist and cute. You can’t go wrong. My last pair of clarks was size 6.5 and this time I ordered a 7 ( after trying it in the store) and it is perfect. 6.5 would have been tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the most comfortable pumps I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable pumps I have ever owned. Not only are they pretty they are great to walk in, even all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable I wanted another pair in another color
customer_reviews.text: I went back to see if I could get these in another color. Unfortunately they were not available in my size. Very comfortable on really bad feet plagued with bunions and corns.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaB

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, hopefully
customer_reviews.text: The toe is narrow. Very comfortable, hopefully, they will stretch out in the toe box. Super cute shoes
customer_reviews.author: KTMarcie

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather.  Stretches to comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 Medium. They were snug at first, but, stretched to a perfect fit! They are very comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Turman

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable heels I have ever worn! Bought because my heel slips in most high heels. Love the rubber sole, I can wear all day. The not too round toe is comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie HB

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I’m on my feet all day for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’m on my feet all day for work and they stay comfortable! I don’t have to switch into flats in order to keep my feet happy and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rea

customer_reviews.title: Well made, beautiful, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and comfortable. I love Clarks shoes in general, and this pair does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: mamasmiles

customer_reviews.title: Every pair of Clark's that I own are super comfy, but for some reason these kill my ...
customer_reviews.text: Every pair of Clark's that I own are super comfy, but for some reason these kill my feet. Maybe they are a little narrow. They're cute and I can wear them for about an hour
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but never wear first time on an international working trip with lots of walking
customer_reviews.author: Nicole  Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is everything I wanted it to be. Comfortable, beautiful, sized correctly and much more. I will be trying to get this in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Masimba Muskwe

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed, they transgression and look perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed a shoe to go with a retro styles dress I ordered. I went with the real leather Clark's knowing I needed for and comfort, actually paying more for them than I did the dress. I was not disappointed, they transgression and look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes for work.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, wear them at work and am very pleased with fit and comfort. Supportive and heel is just high enough.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to return these because the wide was not wide enough and the next size up would of been to big they are super cute and I just love the quality of Clarks
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEA

customer_reviews.title: Size 12 can feel beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are matte black, comfortable and stylish. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: buyer of stuff

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love but not the right fit
customer_reviews.text: My regular size 7 crushed my toes but 7.5 was too big and the heel slips up. Wanted to love but not the right fit
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They were tight across the top but slipped up and down on my heels. Very cute shoes but not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy most of the day but may not be the right shoe if you have bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my sister. She loved how comfortable and pretty the shoes are. High quality as other Clarks shoes.
customer_reviews.author: AP Wang

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful. I was going to send them back but ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful. I was going to send them back but they are so nice I decided to keep them. I no longer needed this color of shoe but just too pretty to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, wish the strap was elastic instead of having to strap them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Mother. The loves those shoes greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! Comfortable !! Just runs somewhat small so I suggest you get the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: LINA CHEHADEH

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE SHOES. I actually own 2 pairs
customer_reviews.text: INCREDIBLE SHOES. I actually own 2 pairs. Like walking on air. Fits amazing and so GOURGEOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Clarks' Mary Jane shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Mary Jane's with a heel that is supportive and not too high
customer_reviews.author: Myra-Delia D. Kagey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very easy to walk in and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fab, nice, clean lines!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pair of shoes! A little bit pricey, but it's Clarks, and their shoes are usually worth it. I've given it four ★ because I haven't actually worn it out as yet. However, it fits well, has a comfortable heel, the insoles are quite comfy, and the style is classic. I'll change my rating after they're road tested. ** So, I road tested this and it's an excellent pair of shoes! Very comfortable. I love the insoles! Loooove the rounded toe cap! I got a half size bigger than I normally wear, and it was a good decision. An all around great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: ESTRIANA

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, but it is too large by a half an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Meztli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, but the wide width was too narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, but the wide width was too narrow for my foot and cut exactly across my bunion. I wish it came in double wide! I hate my feet! Normally a 9.5 wide is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Sure Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, color, and the heels are perfect. Fits well and very confortable I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Happy15

customer_reviews.title: perfect Clark shoe.  buy these!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great shoe. I always wear a 7 wide in Clarks. Fit is exactly as should be. They are perfect with a almost any outfit. Very comfortable. I will wear these out!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, but the heel is really higher than I want. I ordered a 9.5W which is my usual size, and if there wasn't a strap, these shoes would fall off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love fabulous shoes for work
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are so comfortable to wear for work when I'm on my feet for 10+ hrs but I never complain because I my feet never ache.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Just felt in love with these
customer_reviews.text: Just felt in love with these. Had a full day official event and they felt very comfortable although I wore them for first time.
customer_reviews.author: Gulnar M.

customer_reviews.title: They're great! I wear them at work (I work 13 ...
customer_reviews.text: They're great! I wear them at work (I work 13 hour days) and they've been great to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful and comfortable! They are my favorite dress shoes to wear. Be advised, you will likely need to go a 1/2 size up as per other reviews. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: All the shoes that I have ordered from Amazon hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mark

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple classy look of these shoes. Even more though, I love how comfortable they are. I wear a size 10 and they fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shellymo

customer_reviews.title: ... cushion under the ball of your foot making it painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe but enough cushion under the ball of your foot making it painful to wear. Really too bad because everything else about this shoe is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and beautiful! The color is very rich, just like the picture. Perfect for everyday wear to the office. Can take any casual outfit to the next level. Love these! Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: AWilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heel looks larger in picture but shoes fit very well>
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... always count on Clarks to make my feet feel like they are in heaven
customer_reviews.text: I can always count on Clarks to make my feet feel like they are in heaven. They are always soooo comfortable. Kay Romine
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kay Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit just right. I'm a size 7 and ordered size 7. They are pretty and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Flower P

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting for thin feet
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning they looked somewhat narrow, but later, while using them, they fitted perfect and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kcs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I purchased 3 different CLARK brand shoes and they are all very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pair of shoes. Very comfortable. Wore them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: I ordered wide for extra comfort, as I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered wide for extra comfort, as I have done in another shoe, but I guess I really am not a wide in Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Nice to wear heels that do not kill your feet!
customer_reviews.author: LaKisha Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered them a half size too big as per the reviews, and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and are adorable!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are good quality and on spec with fit. Also very adorable!
customer_reviews.author: MKTXMOM

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! These shoes are truly excellent. Quality made, fit perfectly, super nice and comfortable. Extremely happy with the purchase. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these shoes on a coworker and had to have them. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wore them to a wedding. No need to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the shoes are beautiful and super
customer_reviews.text: Run a little big, I need half size small, the shoes are beautiful and super comfortablep
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, a little tight at top around the edge but that will losen up. Great look. Love love the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DULCE

customer_reviews.title: 5 thanking that it was going to fit but is a bit to big but it is a very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 7.5 thanking that it was going to fit but is a bit to big but it is a very nice shoes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the style & the quality, but it fit too large. Need to return for smaller size

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe fits good with a small slip guard ..good product

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought as far as looks and they fit to size. Great shoe!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how they fit and the pillows of clouds inside

customer_reviews.title: Painful area on top of bottom of your foot
customer_reviews.text: I wore them around the house and there was a painful part, I wore them to work and still painful, I thought I just had to wear them in. I’ve Ron them once a week for a month and they’re bad in the one spot on my right foot. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Child

customer_reviews.title: My grandson love it, and found it to be a pleasure ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love it , and found it to be a pleasure to put togather

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Garnit Tianna Dress Pump
product_meta.description: The garnit tianna is a beautiful mary jane pump made with rich materials and detailing across the toe. it is made with cushion soft features and an ortholite footbed for added comfort.How to measure your foot:Place your foot on a flat surface with your heel against a straight edge. Place a ruler beside your foot touching the straight edge your heel is also touching, then take the length in millimetres from the tip of your longest toe to your heel. Please be aware that your longest toe may not always be your big toe.
